channel.title: Bing on Azure Readiness starts here...
channel.description: Recent content in Bing on Azure Readiness starts here...

item.title: Bing Desktop Wallpapers take you on a trip around the world
item.description: Due to COVID19, my traveling rhythm went down from an avg 90% the last six years, to 0%. I have never been that much at home without travel than in these last 5 weeks (and a few more to come). While the primary reason for my travel is business related, every now and then, I have the opportunity to enjoy the area, if even only for a short moment, or in-between delivering sessions.
